00023 #ifndef _COMMGR_H_
00024 #define _COMMGR_H_
00025 
00026 class CComMgr;
00027 
00028 enum
00029 {
00030         CIPL_SOCKET_FLAG_EVENT = (1<<0),
00031         CIPL_SOCKET_FLAG_RETVAL = (1<<1),
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct CIPL_Socket
00035 {
00036         SOCKET sock;
00037         HANDLE thread;
00038         CComMgr *pmgr;
00039         DWORD flag;
00040         int exit;
00041 
00042         CIPL_Socket()
00043         {
00044                 sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00045                 thread = NULL;
00046                 pmgr = NULL;
00047                 flag = 0;
00048                 exit = 0;
00049         }
00050         ~CIPL_Socket()
00051         {
00052                 thread = NULL;
00053                 pmgr = NULL;
00054         }
00055         void CloseSocket()
00056         {
00057                 if(sock!=INVALID_SOCKET)
00058                 {
00059                         exit = 1;
00060                         shutdown(sock, SD_BOTH);
00061                         closesocket(sock);
00062                         sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00063                 }
00064         }
00065         void Close()
00066         {
00067                 CloseSocket();
00068                 if(thread)
00069                 {
00070                         WaitForSingleObject(thread,INFINITE);
00071                         CloseHandle(thread);
00072                         thread = NULL;
00073                 }
00074                 pmgr = NULL;
00075                 flag = 0;
00076                 exit = 0;
00077         }
00078 };
00079

00082 public:
00083         CComMgr();
00084         virtual ~CComMgr();

00086         DECLARE_IUNKNOWN;
00087         STDMETHOD(NonDelegatingQueryInterface)(REFIID riid, LPVOID *ppvObj);
00088         // ICiplMediaEventSink

00092                 IN OUT TCHAR *szEventSession, IN DWORD ccEventSession,
00093                 IN OUT TCHAR *szEventName, IN DWORD ccEventName,
00094                 IN OUT TCHAR *szEventReturn, IN DWORD ccEventReturn);
00095         STDMETHOD(Open)(ICiplCtlMgr *pCtlMgr);
00096         STDMETHOD(Close)();
00097         STDMETHOD(ExecuteImmediateCmdString)(const TCHAR *szSession, const TCHAR *szCommand, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00098         STDMETHOD(ExecuteImmediateCmdList)(const TCHAR *szSession, INT argc, const TCHAR *const *argv, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00099         STDMETHOD(RegisterConsole)(LPVOID pConsoleContext, LPFN_CiplMgrConsoleCallback pConsoleCallback);
00100         STDMETHOD(UnregisterConsole)(LPVOID pConsoleContext, LPFN_CiplMgrConsoleCallback pConsoleCallback);
00101         STDMETHOD(SetEscape)(TCHAR tcEscape)
00102         {
00103                 return CBaseMgr::SetEscape(tcEscape);
00104         }
00105 
00106 protected:
00107         STDMETHOD(ExecuteImmediateInternal)(const TCHAR *szSession, INT argc, const TCHAR *const *argv, TCHAR *szReturn, UINT ccReturn, UINT *pccFilled);
00108         STDMETHOD(OpenSocket)(ULONG ulPort);
00109         STDMETHOD(CloseSocket)();
00110         DWORD ThreadClient(CIPL_Socket *pcs);
00111         static DWORD WINAPI ThreadClient_Ext(LPVOID pParam);
00112         DWORD ThreadListen(CIPL_Socket *pcs);
